meanings.definition: Lacking a face or facial features.
meanings.sent1: The faceless mannequin stood in the store window.
meanings.sent2: The spy wore a faceless mask to conceal their identity.
meanings.sent3: In the dark, the faceless figure seemed almost ghostly.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a sea of faceless buildings.
meanings.sent5: The faceless doll gave me an eerie feeling.

meanings.definition: Having no distinctive or recognizable characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The faceless corporation cared only about profits.
meanings.sent2: The suspect was described as a faceless figure in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The faceless robot performed its tasks with precision.
meanings.sent4: The faceless crowd moved like a single entity.
meanings.sent5: The faceless bureaucracy made it hard to get answers.

meanings.sent1: The faceless employees all wore identical uniforms.
meanings.sent2: The faceless voice on the phone provided no comfort.
meanings.sent3: The faceless character in the story was easily forgotten.
meanings.sent4: The faceless mass of students moved through the halls.
meanings.sent5: The faceless mask hid the performer's true emotions.
